statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, phone_number FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_data ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email_address FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_data WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM supplier_data WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM supplier_data WHERE email_address LIKE '%@yahoo.com' OR phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM supplier_data;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM supplier_data ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, product_price FROM supplier_data JOIN supplier_products ON supplier_data.supplier_id = supplier_products.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_phone = '1234567890';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone, product_name, product_price FROM supplier_data JOIN supplier_products ON supplier_data.supplier_id = supplier_products.supplier_id WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM supplier_products WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_products.product_name, supplier_products.product_price FROM supplier_data LEFT JOIN supplier_products ON supplier_data.supplier_id = supplier_products.supplier_id WHERE supplier_products.product_price < 40.00;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, city, country FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, address, city FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM SupplierContacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Suppliers, SupplierOrders WHERE Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierOrders.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY country;
SELECT supplier_name, city, country FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, sc.contact_name, sc.email FROM Suppliers s JOIN SupplierContacts sc ON s.supplier_id = sc.supplier_id WHERE s.city = 'New York' AND sc.email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT so.order_id, so.order_date, so.total_amount, s.supplier_name FROM SupplierOrders so JOIN Suppliers s ON so.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE so.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY so.order_date DESC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(so.order_id) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers s LEFT JOIN SupplierOrders so ON s.supplier_id = so.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, city, state FROM addresses WHERE postal_code LIKE '94%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, email FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT city, state, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price FROM supplier_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE 'example%@domain.com';
SELECT supplier_id, product_name, price FROM supplier_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, sp.product_name, sp.price FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_products sp ON s.supplier_id = sp.supplier_id;
SELECT so.order_id, so.order_date, sp.product_name, so.total_amount FROM supplier_orders so JOIN supplier_products sp ON so.supplier_id = sp.supplier_id WHERE so.total_amount > 1000;
